Utils

Class Brush

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.Brush

  • public class Brush
extends java.lang.Object
    A brush is a geometric form attached to a blob and can interfere with others objects.

    • Field Summary

      Rectangle's brush where blob's center is the top-left corner
